channel.title: scrum on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in scrum on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Agile Project Retrospectives the perfect measure
item.description: Seriously - Next time you’re running a project retrospective or other review, keep a count of your WTFs/minute.

item.title: When done is really done - Scrum - post it note management
item.description: There really is nothing better then looking at your office wall and knowing that done is done.

item.title: Productivity Tip - Technical Writing - the Writer's Block
item.description: Each week I set aside time to good writing, but its not the same when each day there are technical documents and scrum artefacts to be prepared.

item.title: Task Management with Post-It Notes
item.description: As I’m a certified Scrum Master and very good at project and task management I can say I enjoy running planning sessions with teams I do work with.
